description: This course is a study of the larger forms of choral music from the Baroque to the present. Students study scores and recordings and discuss representative style features and characteristics, interpretation, and conducting problems. Prerequisite: Music 214, 241, and 242 and junior standing. Offered spring semester 2013-14 and alternate years.
name: Choral Lit II
prerequisites: Music 214, 241, and 242 and junior standing. Offered spring semester 2013-14 and alternate years.
